text: Serial describes a group of objects that come one after the other. * Serial number: giving a number to each item to make them orderly * Serial communication: a computer connection that moves pieces of information one at a time. * Movie serial: a short movie that has chapters that come one after the other shown with a bigger film, first shown around 1930 and 1940 * Serial killer: someone who murdered people at different times * Serialism: a way of ordering notes in music * Serial (publishing): the publication of a journal in separate parts under the same title. Example: Nature (journal). * Serial (literature) often a work of narrative fiction published in sequential installments. * Serial (radio and television), series of radio and television programs that rely on a continuing plot ==Related pages== * Series
title: Serial
